snippet: President Hugo Chávez appointed as defense minister Gen. Henry Rangel Silva, whom the United States has described as a drug kingpin linked to cocaine smuggling from Colombia.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez appoints Gen Henry Rangel Silva as defense minister; Silva is described by the United States government as a drug kingpin linked to cocaine smuggling in Colombia, accusations which Chavez has denied.
lead_paragraph: President Hugo Chávez appointed as defense minister Gen. Henry Rangel Silva, whom the United States has described as a drug kingpin linked to cocaine smuggling from Colombia.
